name: Shapeshifting Adventure: Nine and the Mine
name_original: Shapeshifting Adventure: Nine and the Mine
description:
The Christmas Special for Shapeshifting Adventure!

Shapeshifting Adventure: Nine and the Mine sets about a week before the main game. This short Christmas Special contains only 3 levels.

You are Nine, setting an adventure into the mines. The caves aren't friendly, they are filled with traps and monsters. You are here to remove impostor-miners who were here to steal the golds. Can you remove all of them and escape the caves?

:: Warning ::
This game is very difficult. Nithriotto Games will not be responsible for damaged equipment.

Features

  • A child who is a doll and a number for a name.
  • Medieval soundtracks and some medieval themes!
  • An ungrateful miner.
  • Hugo Sasau, a wizard who is also a plague doctor.
  • 9 gold-stealers to be sent away!
  • Brutal difficulty and an unfair journey!

Notes

  • You do not shapeshift in this game. It's a shapeshifting adventure, as in the adventure is shapeshifting (to make your journey more difficult).
  • The main theme for the levels are from PlayOnLoop.
